code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,  // Clock signal
    input logic d,    // Data input
    input logic r,    // Synchronous reset, active high
    output logic q    // Data output
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (r) begin
            q <= 1'b0;  // Reset output to 0
        end
        else begin
            q <= d;     // Capture input
        end
    end

endmodule
